name: Moray Doomsday - free multiplayer fight
description:
Cruel monsters have gone out from the hell to enslave all universe! Who else but you have to stop them! Glad to dozens of modificators,saws,teleporters,space ships and other usefull things make this task possible, but be aware of other players and sly morays. There are multiplayer with rank system, bonuses and gripping daily quests.
Heroes with unique skills will not make you bored!
